hibernate-mapping.query: select t from Tela t join fetch t.modulo m where m = :modulo and t.publico = :publico order by t.nome
select t from Tela t where t.nome = :nomeTela and t.modulo.nome = :nomeModulo
select t from Tela t where t.publico = false order by :order
select t from Tela t where t.publico = true order by :order
select t from PerfilTela pt left join pt.perfil p left join pt.tela t join fetch t.modulo m where p = :perfil order by t.nome
